meanings.definition: A plant of the borage family with blue flowers.
meanings.sent1: The alkanet in the garden has beautiful blue flowers.
meanings.sent2: I learned about the alkanet plant in my science class.
meanings.sent3: The alkanet decided to show off its blue flowers at the garden party.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled like the blue flowers of the alkanet plant.
meanings.sent5: The alkanet plant stood out with its vibrant blue blooms.

meanings.definition: A red dye obtained from the roots of the alkanet plant.
meanings.sent1: She used alkanet to dye the fabric a deep red color.
meanings.sent2: The alkanet dye gave the cloth a rich red hue.
meanings.sent3: The alkanet dye accidentally turned his hair bright red!
meanings.sent4: The sunset painted the sky with colors reminiscent of alkanet dye.
meanings.sent5: The alkanet dye transformed the plain fabric into a stunning red masterpiece.

meanings.definition: A red dye obtained from the roots of the alkanet plant, used in coloring oils and varnishes.
meanings.sent1: The alkanet dye is perfect for coloring oils and varnishes.
meanings.sent2: Artists often use alkanet to add a touch of red to their paintings.
meanings.sent3: The alkanet dye spilled and turned the workshop into a red mess!
meanings.sent4: The alkanet dye infused the room with a warm, red glow.
meanings.sent5: The scent of alkanet filled the air as the varnish dried to a deep red shade.
